instruction: Create a storyboard illustrating the main events of a movie.
output: A storyboard illustrating the main events of Avatar would include scenes such as the main character, Jake, arriving on Pandora; the introduction of the Na'vi people; the battle against the military forces to save the Tree of Souls; and the ultimate victory. Other scenes could include Jake's transformation into the Avatar body and his journey of self-discovery as he learns to appreciate the Na'vi people and their connection to the world of Pandora.
